---

# arubacloud_kms

Manages an ArubaCloud Key Management Service (KMS) resource. KMS provides secure key management for encryption operations.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "arubacloud_kms" "example" {
  name           = "production-kms"
  project_id     = arubacloud_project.example.id
  location       = "ITBG-Bergamo"
  billing_period = "Hour"
  tags           = ["production", "encryption"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) KMS name
- `project_id` (String) ID of the project this KMS belongs to

### Optional

- `billing_period` (String) Billing period for the KMS (default: "Hour")
- `location` (String) Location for the KMS (default: "ITBG-Bergamo")
- `tags` (List of String) List of tags for the KMS (minimum 4 characters per tag)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) KMS identifier
- `uri` (String) KMS URI

## Import

Aruba Cloud KMS can be imported using the `kms_id`.

```shell
terraform import arubacloud_kms.example <kms_id>
```
